entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Kincardine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.9°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 9:02 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:02 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 9:02 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
